syllabus_leaves.path: Local Self-Government-Urban > Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.
path_titles: Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.
syllabus_leaves.title: Urban: Municipal Committees and Municipal Corporations-meaning and functions.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act are the following: > The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act are the following:
The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Act gives constitutional status to urban local bodies.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act are the following: > The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act are the following:
The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.
syllabus_leaves.title: The Act provides for direct election to all the local self-government bodies.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act are the following: > A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act are the following:
A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.
syllabus_leaves.title: A fixed tenure of five years for the municipalities has been prescribed.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act are the following: > 33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act are the following:
33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.
syllabus_leaves.title: 33 per cent of the seats should be reserved for women under each category of SC/ST/Backward Classes.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The salient features of the Act are the following: > District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.
path_titles: The salient features of the Act are the following:
District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.
syllabus_leaves.title: District Planning Committee to be constituted by the State Government.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: Municipal Corporations for larger urban areas.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: Municipal Councils for smaller urban areas.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under: > Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.
path_titles: The Act provides for three tier local bodies for urban areas as under:
Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.
syllabus_leaves.title: Nagar Panchayats for areas in transition from a rural area to urban area.

syllabus_leaves.path: THE CONSTITUTION (74TH AMENDMENT) ACT, 1992 > In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.
path_titles: In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.
syllabus_leaves.title: In addition, there are Town Area Committees, Cantonment Boards and Port Trusts in certain urban areas.
